description: Robust trekking shorts in wind and water resistant G-1000 Original, with double layers of fabric over the rear for extra durability. Practical pockets that have room for everything you want to keep close at hand; two hand pockets, a large map pocket with flap and inside mobile phone pocket on the right leg plus two leg pockets and an axe pocket on the left leg. Mid waist and regular fit.
name: Fjallraven Barents Pro Shorts - Mens
